In an accident, Sing-yan acquires skills for communicating with Donut, and a man and a dog gradually build a friendship and help each other. Sing-yan learns from Donut that Wai-ting has some love issues, so he helps her decipher her conundrum. The duo's relationship improves, and they gradually like each other. programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Exorcist's 2nd Meter, The
programme.desc: Taxi driver Ma Kwai (Kenneth Ma) goes down the road to exorcism as he is destined to perpetuate the legacy of genie Shek Kam-dong. He is also reunited with the mature soul of his buddy Mok Wai-ho (Hubert Wu). He even encounters Sze Loi-sze (Gloria Tang) and his younger brother Sze Lo-sze, who are both exorcists. However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

Menyedari 419 telah menghuni tubuh manusia, Black memutuskan untuk memasuki tubuh Malik untuk bersaing dengannya. Pada mata manusia, 'Malik' telah terselamat daripada kematian dengan menakjubkan sekali dan akibat kejadian itu dia telah hilang ingatan. Dalam pada itu, Sofia mula menyedari yang 'Malik' merupakan buat hatinya semasa kecil dan dia diselubungi rasa bersalah kerana telah meletak Malik dalam situasi bahaya. Namun 'Malik' sekarang ialah Black - biadab, mementingkan diri sendiri dan tekad dengan satu tujuan dalam misinya. Adakah dia akan ingat siapa Sofia sebenarnya? Black mendapati dirinya berdepan dengan pembunuhan yang mengerikan semasa dia cuba mengharungi dunia manusia. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy.
